entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
